thread.title: Great place, great staying
thread.title_full: Great place, great staying - Review of Grand Hyatt Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Luca251062
title: Great place, great staying
text:
Wonderful hotel located in the best place of Beijing, a short walk to Tien an men square and the Forbidden City. Much quality in everything, from the logic of the room, the enviroment, the amenities, the food, and the staff was extremely kind and efficient.
Cant ask for more. I shall return.
